system.description:
When you select this archetype at 2nd level, you learn the ray of frost cantrip if you do not know it already.

In addition, all cold spells count as witch spells for you and whenever you cast a cold spell of 1st level or higher, it counts as being one spell slot higher than you actually expended, to a maximum of the highest level spell slot you posess. In the case of fire shield and infernal weapon this benefit only applies when casting the cold version.
system.prerequisite: Level 2 Witch Class; Winter Witch archetype
